ARABIC: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We made his kingdom strong and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We further strengthened his kingdom, and bestowed wisdom on him, and judgement in legal matters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We strengthened his kingdom and endowed him with wisdom and decisive judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We strengthened his kingdom, giving him wisdom and the power of sound Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and just speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We made his kingdom strong and gave him Al-Hikmah and sound judgement in speech and decision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We strengthened his kingdom and We gave him wisdom and a clear judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and speech decisive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We made his kingdom strong and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We made his kingdom strong, and bestowed upon him wisdom and sagacity in judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We made his dominion strong and vouchsafed him wisdom and decisive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We consolidated his kingdom and gave him wisdom and conclusive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We made his kingdom strong and gave him Al-Hikmah (Prophethood, etc.) and sound judgement in speech and decision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We made his kingdom strong and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:20]   And We strengthened his Kingdom, We reinforced it with guards and hosts: every night there thirty thousand men would be standing guard at his sanctuary; and gave him wisdom, prophethood and sound judgement in [all] matters, and decisive speech, [the ability to formulate] a satisfactory statement [for a decision] in any endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We made his kingdom strong) with guardsmen; his royal chamber was guarded every night by 30,000 men (and gave him wisdom) prophethood (and decisive speech) and judgement; he never stumbled in his speech when he judged between people. In his judgement proof was required from the claimant while an oath was required from the defendant.
